iPhone 5

screen.width        320
screen.height       568
devicePixelRatio    2


When    orientation=portrait,
        scale=1,
        viewport-width=320,
        view=full

innerWidth          320
innerHeight         460


When    orientation=portrait,
        scale=1,
        viewport-width=320,
        view=minimal

innerWidth          320
innerHeight         529


When    orientation=portrait,
        scale=0.25,
        viewport-width=1280,
        view=minimal

innerWidth          1280
innerHeight         2114


When    orientation=landscape,
        scale=1,
        viewport-width=568,
        view=minimal

innerWidth          568
innerHeight         320


When    orientation=landscape,
        scale=0.25,
        viewport-width=2272,
        view=minimal

innerWidth          2272
innerHeight         1280
